headline: CNN Live Event/Special
subHeadline: CNN's "The Fourth in America" Special Returns With An All-Star Lineup. Aired 11p-12a ET

utterances.speaker: DANA BASH, CNN ANCHOR, CHIEF POLITICAL CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: Love that song. You are watching CNN's "Fourth in America." There is a lot ahead before the big finish with fireworks displays on the West Coast, including Alaska. Victor Blackwell and Cari Champion are standing by in San Diego as our coverage continues into the night. Hi, guys.

utterances.speaker: VICTOR BLACKWELL, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: Hey, you guys have had a great couple of hours. But there is a lot more to come. We've got some great shows, including here from the San Diego Bay.

utterances.speaker: CARI CHAMPION, CNN CONTRIBUTOR
utterances.sentences: Yeah, we do. And I think it's funny because we were talking about some of these songs. When you hear them, they take you back. And I know not necessarily the concert because I feel as if 4th of July is like a huge concert, "All American Rejects," I love them.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: But you're here for the fireworks as well.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I'm here for the fireworks. I love an old-fashioned firework show. No shade at the drone shows --(LAUGHTER) -- that some cities do. But I like a boom. And we're going to get that big baby boom here, one of the biggest fireworks shows in the country.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yup.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And then we've got shows across the country, including -- and I'm excited about this -- this year, for the first time in 4th of America, we're going to Alaska.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Okay. That's going to be amazing.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Over the mountains in Alaska. Wait until you see this. It's going to be beautiful.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: I'm looking forward to Darius Rucker as well. He is coming up.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: You guys know him from "Hootie & the Blowfish." He's just Darius now.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: But I do know for a fact he is a huge sports fan. That's where I first met him, in that world. So, I'm looking forward to seeing what he's going to give us tonight.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: You know, I just want -- we've got a shot, I think, we can take to show you what's around us. The boats are out. There are people who have brought their chairs and their families to the seawall.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: So nice.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: It is amazing here now.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: We hear some fireworks.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We hear some fireworks.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: We hear some fireworks now.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: These are like the independent family fireworks that we are hearing right now.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: The ones I did when I was a kid?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Right. Yeah, that is coming.(LAUGHTER) But, I mean, this is a beautiful setting. So, be with us tonight for this amazing show over San Diego. We've got San Francisco, we've got Philly, we've got some --

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Nashville!

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Nashville as well.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: They actually showed a shot of Nashville earlier and it was packed. That's going to be huge. That's going to be a good thing to see. Have you been in Nashville recently?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Uh, been a couple of years.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: A couple. Okay.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We'll go together tonight.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: We'll go together tonight.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Boris, back to you.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: Can we come?(LAUGHTER)

utterances.speaker: BORIS SANCHEZ, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: Would love an invite, guys.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes, of course. You can all go is what we mean.

utterances.speaker: BRAD PAISLEY, SINGER
utterances.sentences: Good evening, everyone. Who is in love tonight? Oh, my goodness. That is country freaking music right here on Broadway.(BRAD PAISLEY PERFORMING) (APPLAUSE)

utterances.speaker: PAISLEY
utterances.sentences: We can't do this today without these folks. Thank you, guys, so very, very much for doing what you do for this country. We appreciate you more than we can show you. We owe you more. We can never pay. However, we would like to start this evening with a beer. We have a bar back here. I don't know if I'm allowed to say this, but at ease, soldiers, and have yourself a drink tonight. You've earned it. God bless you. Thanks for your service.(APPLAUSE) (BRAD PAISLEY PERFORMING)

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: Brad Paisley puffing up (ph) the crowd. Absolutely amazing. He's so great.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: He is fantastic, yeah.

utterances.speaker: BASH
utterances.sentences: And yes, we are wearing silly glasses. But you know what? It's late and why not? Our colleague, John Robinson, got these for the bureau and so we thought, we should wear them, we should honor them.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: We needed some eye protection from the brightness --(LAUGHTER) -- of Braid Paisley star and obviously all the lights up in Nashville. And shout out as he gave to members of our armed services. He offered them a beer. Their sacrifice is so important. And obviously, we honor that as we celebrate our nation tonight.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Nashville, you're looking good. Fireworks still going on, wowing the crowds there, as this "Fourth in America" continues here on CNN. I'm Victor Blackwell with Cari Champion in San Diego.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: We love it here in San Diego. I will tell you, we've been having a few moments. I think I'm going to get you to come to Nashville with me, right?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I'm ready.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: We're ready to do some fireworks, have a good time. BLACKWELL

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: That was a beautiful sight that we saw. But I'll tell you what. I personally love Philadelphia. I've been there a few times. I get to hang out with Philly cheesesteak? What do you do?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Oh, not Philly cheesesteak. I just love the city.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: You love the city to hang out.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I love the city.

utterances.speaker: LOVATO
utterances.sentences: Thank you so much!(FIREWORKS) (END VIDEOTAPE)

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Demi Lovato! Fantastic performance. And look at these fireworks over Philadelphia on the birthday --

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- of our country. You've got to go to Philly and show the show.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: You have to show the show. Look at Nashville. Take a look over there. They had an entire city street lit with people waiting to see this concert and, obviously, the fireworks. A city that I think represents what we are celebrating tonight. That's the nation's concert.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: You know, Nashville, this show has been going on for some time now. I don't know if we're at the finale yet, but they have really put on a show tonight. And, I mean, Nashville has really rivaled some of the shows we have seen from D.C. --

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- New York and Philly had a great --

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: I would say equally. I would say equally in terms of what they bring. It's obviously one of the fastest-growing cities. They have so much there. People are watching in terms of where to go. That is the next place that you and I will attend, a concert.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: You are determined to get me to a concert in Nashville.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: I am determined to get Victor to a concert in Nashville.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: It's a great music city.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: It's so -- so you say yes.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I've said yes.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Okay. I don't know. See, we sit on camera. We can roll the tape back. Okay?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes. I've said yes.(LAUGHTER) And it is now getting dark here in San Diego.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We are standing here on San Diego Bay on the pier here waiting for the big bay boom, one of the great shows, one of many great shows still to come tonight as "Fourth in America" special continue.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We are coming to you live from San Diego on this "Fourth in America." Look at this sight.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: So beautiful. So beautiful. I'll tell you what, we're not really setting the tone. We can see, obviously, the skyline and the boats.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: But I want everyone to know at home, it really is a family friendly event. Over to our right, you can see all of these families walking along the pier, walking along the bay --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: They got white lights on, riding along the seawall.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: They got their bike lights on. They're bike riding. It really feels like the celebration were supposed to have for 4th of July.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: It is beautiful. The people are here waiting for the big show. The big bay boom that's coming to cap off the show here. It has been a fantastic weekend --

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- here on Coronado Island right along the San Diego Bay.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: I've enjoyed it.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: There are so much more coming.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN, ZAC BROWN BAND MEMBER
utterances.sentences: Thank you.(END VIDEOTAPE)

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Zac Brown Band with cover of "Paint It, Black." I love it.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Fantastic. More music from Zac Brown Band and the fireworks over Chicago. We saw a bit of Nashville mixed in there. I mean, that is a fantastic show. We have had some great shows today.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: America's birthday party shifting to the West Coast. Fireworks about to launch here in San Diego. Live look here across San Diego Bay. That San Diego skyline, you can see the boats there waiting for the show above. There are shows across the country on stage, celebrating this great country.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: That was an absolutely wonderful performance. I did a little research on "The Roots of Music" and the guy who actually started the academy was a CNN hero.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Derrick Tabb.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yeah, which I think is so amazing. And these kids, between the ages of 9 and 14 years old.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I love that we're highlighting that this year as, of course, we're watching the New Orleans fireworks show.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: The second group you saw, they are 9 to 14.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yeah. BLACKWELL

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: I love it.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: What's great about this also is that "The Roots of Music Academy" --

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- is a 10-month program that teaches them more than music but how to start a music production business.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Which is so important. Yeah. And it's for low-income kids. They have all the support around it. Ancillary support programs.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And they are good.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: And they're -- on top of, they're good, although, I said they should wear some jackets because I was, like, oh, their arms are cold.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Put some jackets on these kids.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: I turned into a grandma, put jackets on.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We are moments away from one of the biggest fireworks shows on the West Coast here in San Diego. The 4th of July celebration, it is kicking into high gear on this side of the country right now. I'm Victor Blackwell along with Cari Champion.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Victor, thank you so much for having me here hanging out with you.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: It has been a pleasure.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: It has been a pleasure. It's our first time working together but it has been a fast friendship.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Much like what we are watching across the nation right now. Everyone is celebrating. It is a festive time, a festive mood. I'm excited about this firework show. I know that's your thing.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: You know I love a good firework show.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: I know that's your thing, but I'm here for it.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And this is the one on the West Coast. Everyone talks about New York and Philly and D.C. On the West Coast, it is the big bay boom. We're standing on the pier here on the San Diego Bay.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: So gorgeous.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And people have been crowding in along the seawall. Here is a look. The boats are here waiting for the stars above.(LAUGHTER) I've been saying the stars onstage and stars exploding above us.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: Yes. We've seen some fireworks, not too many, some fireworks.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: CHAMPION
utterances.sentences: But you also pointed out, look at all the families that are still here.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Lots of families. We can hear the kids from here.
